title: Getting Started with Node.js
description: Covers Node.js framework, asynchronous programming, building HTTP servers, Express.js, Socket.IO, and unit testing.

title: SheCodes Basics
description: Covers the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: SheCodes Plus
description: Focuses on more advanced web development topics, including React, APIs, and project deployment.

title: SheCodes Responsive
description: Teaches responsive design principles and how to make websites mobile-friendly.

title: Front-End Development
description: Covers front-end development fundamentals including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for building interactive web pages.

title: Responsive Web Design Certification
description: Focuses on responsive web design, including creating flexible layouts, using media queries, and building mobile-first websites.
